testcase.brief: Verify AP will send two different kinds of level alert to HM: interface level alert, and client level alert. There are four alert types, CRC error rate, TX drop/retry rate, Rx drop rate
testcase.description: Description: Verify AP will send two different kinds of level alert to HM: interface level alert, and client level alert. There are four alert types, CRC error rate, TX drop/retry rate, Rx drop rate Pre-condition: AP connect to HM Test procedure: 1.Open _debug capwap trap and debug console to check if trap be generated and sent out 2.Default AP will sent CRC error rate, TX drop/retry rate, Rx drop rate to HM (or execute command “_ test trap-case alert alarmalert” to generate trap) Expect result: Trap be sent to HM

step.log-match: -e "RUN state: Connected securely to the CAPWAP server" -c

step.desc: Open _debug capwap trap to check trap
Use test command to generate alarm alert trap
Show log buffered to check alarm alert trap be generated and be sent to HM in AP1
